actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny any deduction for advertising health insurance.
short_title: Health Insurance Company Advertising Deduction Denial Act of 2009

summary.text: Health Insurance Company Advertising Deduction Denial Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to deny a tax deduction for advertising and other expenses to promote the sale of any insurance which constitutes medical care (health insurance).

titles.title: Health Insurance Company Advertising Deduction Denial Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to deny any deduction for advertising health insurance.
